title: Digital-Tutors - Post Producing your Architectural Visualization
description:
In Architectural Visualization in Photoshop and V-Ray, you will learn how to take a basic render and apply post-production techniques and elements. Then, we will turn to the background image and incorporate a horizon, trees, and more and make them Ã¢â‚¬Å“sitÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ well within the rendered scene. To complete the render, weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll use various V-Ray lighting, shadow and refraction elements too to add a more natural look.

After watching this tutorial, you will know how to create a well-balanced scene that enhances, not overwhelms, your architectural design.

Note: After download, put all compressed files in same directory (folder) and extract 1st file, other files will be extracted automatically
